title: Hogwarts Legacy
text: *as you exit the cave with Professor Fig you see your self standing on top of cliff side*
Player: How dar did that Portkey take us?
Professor Fig: Farther from London than the carriage travelled. We're somewhere in the Scottish Highlands.
Player: Sir - those ruins. Do you think -
Professor Fig: - the Portkey was meant to lead us there? I do.
Professor Fig: This has not been the day either of us expected.
Professor Fig: But Miriam sent that Portkey to George for a reason.
Professor Fig: And I believe that she - and now George - died in pursuit of whatever it was meant to lead to.
Professor Fig: If you're sure you're all right, and wouldn't mind indulging me -
Professor Fig: I'd like to have a look around.

buttons.text: I'm sorry sir - but I'd prefer if we could go back to Hogwarts from here
